data.title: Ambassador Yu Hong Attended the 100th Anniversary Celebration of Chung Hwa Middle School
data.text: On October 29thâand 30th, Chinese Ambassador to Brunei Darussalam H.E. Yu Hong attendedâthe 100thâAnniversary Celebration of the Establishment of Chung Hwa Middle School. His Majesty the SultanâHassanal Bolkiah, His Royal Highness Prince Haji Al-Muhtadee Billah and other Royal family members, Ministers, senior officials from the Government, diplomatic envoys from ASEAN Countries and representatives from the Chineseâcommunities attended the Celebration on October 29th. Ambassador Yu Hong delivered a speech at the Gala Dinnerâon October 30th, and presented a gift to Chung Hwa Middle School to mark the 100thâanniversary. The Board of Directors of the school presented a souvenier to Ambassador Yu to express their thanks to the long-lasting support of the Embassy to the school.
